files.description: Module to search words and phrases in the Quran data. Provides functions for case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches, counting word occurrences, and computing gematrical values for words and verses.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided Quran data and returns verses that contain the search word based on case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Determines if the search is case-sensitive; default is False.

functions.name: search_word_group

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The exact phrase to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, search is case-sensitive; default is False.

parameters.description: The word to search for in the specified Surah.

parameters.description: The Surah number within which to search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.description: Search for a specific word group in a given Surah based on case sensitivity and return verses containing the phrase.

parameters.name: word_group

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Determines if the search is case-sensitive; default is False.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. It loads Quran data and performs various search operations using functions from the quran_search module, then prints the results.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function to load Quran data and perform search operations. It demonstrates functionalities including word search, word group search, verse range queries, word count based searches, and gematrical value calculations, with results printed to the console.
